meanings.definition: Economic activity concerned with the processing of raw materials and manufacture of goods in factories.
meanings.sent1: Local industries provide jobs for many people in our town.
meanings.sent2: The automotive and tech industries are growing rapidly.
meanings.sent3: The industries in this city are like busy beehives.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity is an industry of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The industries hummed with productivity and innovation.

meanings.definition: A particular form or branch of economic or commercial activity.
meanings.sent1: The entertainment industry includes film, music, and TV.
meanings.sent2: She works in the fashion industry as a designer.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream industry is always cool under pressure.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an industry of new business ideas.
meanings.sent5: The industry of online shopping is booming.

meanings.sent1: His success is a result of his industry and dedication.
meanings.sent2: She approached her studies with industry and focus.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's industry in gathering nuts impressed the forest animals.
meanings.sent4: The industry of the students studying late into the night was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The industry of the ants in building their anthill was remarkable.
